ai-patthana3.1:1227.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana3.1:1230.1_0: On the contrary, he must stay in the same sleeping place as before.
ai-patthana3.1:1231.1_0: ‘This is the cause, this is the reason for the donor, this is the reason why the idea of the Dhamma is a condition for the donor.’
ai-patthana3.1:1232.1_0: This is the cause, this is the reason for the sake of non-greed, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit.
ai-patthana3.1:1233.1_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why repulsion is the reason why the teachings don’t arise, for the sake of surmounting the state of non-existence, namely, the three objects of the present life.
ai-patthana3.1:1234.1_0: Not for the sake of non-violence, nor repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, the desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-patthana3.1:1235.1_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why the teachings don’t arise, and the reason for doing so.
ai-patthana3.1:1235.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana3.1:1236.1_0: Nine things are the nine projects. When there is a new state of existence, there is no nine orifices ends in the monasteries. When it’s nine orifices the results in the nine faculties, there are nine faculties that is new. When it comes to the result of deeds, there is nine orifices the nine faculties.
ai-patthana3.1:1236.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana3.1:1237.0_0: the origin of the ending of the robe:
ai-patthana3.1:1237.1_0: This is the cause, this is the reason for the attainment of the impingement, non-disappearance, and repulsion.
ai-patthana3.1:1237.1_1: the condition being by way of arising together condition.
ai-patthana3.1:1237.1_2: the condition being by way of strong support condition.
ai-patthana3.1:1237.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana3.1:1242.1_0: The group of forty-three on being has caused is finished.
